desc: Growing up we were told to sit pretty and quiet, because Prince Charming would always be there to swoop in and save the day if we needed him. Whether it was Dad, or a brother, or a boyfriend...it was always *someone else* doing the saving. But then we grew up. And now we know that the Princess can just save herself.

layout.text:
Outgrowing glass slippers and shattering glass ceilings.
In this story, the Princess saves herself.
